channel.title: Projects on Rob Dimsdale-Zucker
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Rob Dimsdale-Zucker

item.title: Vari desk controller
item.description: Control a vari adjustable-height desk with an embedded controller written in Rust running on custom hardware

item.title: Weather clock
item.description: See the time and the weather forecast with a Raspberry Pi and an LCD display, written in Rust.

item.title: Wunderlist CLI
item.description: Unofficial Wunderlist API client library and CLI, written in Go.

item.title: Garagepi
item.description: View and control a garage door with a webserver written in Go running on a Raspberry Pi

item.title: Rentchecker
item.description: Java command-line and Android app to check rent owed at myequityapartments.com
